summary: UI redesign testing completed successfully. All 26 frontend tests passed (100%). The new 'Soft Utility' professional design is clean, functional, and all core features work correctly after the redesign.

minor.issue: Returns empty results - PIXABAY_API_KEY is empty in .env. This is a configuration issue, not a code bug.

action_items: Configure PIXABAY_API_KEY in backend/.env if image search functionality is needed
critical_code_review_comments: Clean design system implemented correctly with CSS variables for theming
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
Dark mode toggle works correctly with proper contrast
Navigation between pages is smooth and session persists
seed_data_creation: Used existing test user from previous iteration
context_for_next_testing_agent: UI redesign is complete and working. All pages have clean professional design. Image search returns empty results due to missing PIXABAY_API_KEY - this is expected if API key is not configured.

Simplified card designs with minimal shadows
